text: I still don't have any food.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: To be honest, I don't think there's much to eat in a place like this.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: You know, you just might be right.
speaker: themouse

text: If there isn't any food though, why are you hanging around?
speaker: themouse

text: I'm here to become a true warrior. I need to get to the top floor using the mystic artes.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: If I can conquer this tower, I'll be a Wizard of the Board.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Yeah, I hope you don't get eaten!
speaker: themouse
